SELECT t1.community_name ,t2.building_name , t2.units , t3.* FROM t_community t1 LEFT JOIN t_building t2 ON t2.community_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_house t3 ON t3.community_id = t1.id AND t3.deleted = 0
AND t2.building_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{buildingName},'%')
AND t1.community_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{communityName},'%')
AND t2.units LIKE CONCAT('%',#{units},'%')
AND t3.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{houseNumber},'%')
